meanings.sent1: She is leveraging her skills to excel in her job.
meanings.sent2: He is leveraging his connections to find a new job.
meanings.sent3: By leveraging her creativity, she turned a simple idea into a successful business.
meanings.sent4: Just like a lever, she is leveraging her resources to lift her career to new heights.
meanings.sent5: By leveraging his knowledge, he was able to solve the problem quickly.

meanings.definition: Influence or manipulate (a situation or system) to achieve a desired outcome.
meanings.sent1: They are leveraging their influence to make a positive change in the community.
meanings.sent2: She is leveraging her charm to get what she wants.
meanings.sent3: He tried leveraging the situation, but it backfired hilariously.
meanings.sent4: Like a skilled chess player, she is leveraging the dynamics of the game to her advantage.
meanings.sent5: By leveraging their teamwork, they were able to complete the project ahead of schedule.
